title: The Tale of Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves: A Story from the Arabian Nights
description: Ali Baba learns the special words to open a secret lair filled with the loot of the forty thieves, but when he tells his brother, Qasim, greed takes over and Qasim is found dead, leaving Ali Baba to wonder if he had been better off not knowing the words at all.
author: Eric A. Kimmel
